mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_branch_relation_log( project_id, branch_id, num, label, MASTER, masterDisplay, slaver, slaverDisplay, opt, time, author, deleter )SELECT project_id, branch_id, num, label, MASTER, masterDisplay, slaver, slaverDisplay, opt, time, author, deleter FROM project_branch_relation WHERE project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

INSERT INTO project_user_relation_log( project_id, user_id, type, name, pinyin, section, post, specialty, author, deleter, time )SELECT project_id, user_id, type, name, pinyin, section, post, specialty, author, deleter, time FROM project_user_relation WHERE project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type=#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from project_user_relation where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type=#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_file_relation_log( project_id, file_id, name, original, path, author, deleter )SELECT project_id, file_id, name, original, path, author, deleter FROM project_file_relation WHERE file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
